mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, RDATE FROM BOARD_CONTENT ORDER BY BNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_CONTENT(BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, RDATE) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_CONTENT SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WHERE BNO = #{bno}
